```py
>>> s = pd.Series([1, 2, 2, 3], index=['cat', 'dog', 'dog', 'mouse'])
>>> s
cat    1
dog    2
dog    2
mouse  3
dtype: int64
>>> s.kurt()
1.5 
```

```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'a': [1, 2, 2, 3], 'b': [3, 4, 4, 4]},
...                   index=['cat', 'dog', 'dog', 'mouse'])
>>> df
 a   b
 cat  1   3
 dog  2   4
 dog  2   4
mouse  3   4
>>> df.kurt()
a   1.5
b   4.0
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'a': [1, 2], 'b': [3, 4], 'c': [3, 4], 'd': [1, 2]},
...                   index=['cat', 'dog'])
>>> df.kurt(axis=1)
cat   -6.0
dog   -6.0
dtype: float64 
```
